tabs.Name: Anti Satanism
Content: You really believe in satan? Go kill yourself!

Maybe your retarded ass will learn once you shoot yourself!
Imagine believing in a tomato looking ass nigga LOL

Fuck you and your low budget crisp tomato leader!
You really are retarded to believe in a tomato as your almighty leader!
You believe in a goat as your leader? Probably because your a degenerate ass furry!
